pages.title: Quest System
pages.text: This modpack includes a quest system. Completing quests lets you experience much of the content and earn rewards.$(br2)Hold the $(key)Quest Scroll$() and right-click to browse active quests. Select one and right-click again to submit it. Submitting unlocks new quests.

When you submit a quest, the system checks your current status. Common checks include:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Attributes$()$(list)$(bold)Advancement$()$(list)$(bold)Whether you have certain items$()$(br)(You must manually place the required items in your $(bold)inventory, equipment slots, or trinket slots$().)$(br2)Quest progress is $(bold)per-player$(). If you want to share progress with friends, you can share the required items with them.
$(br)If you accidentally lose the $(key)Quest Scroll$(), don't worry â€” you can craft a new one at a very low cost.
